shortDescription: Joined the startup as an entry-level full-stack developer...
tasksPerformed: Joined the startup as an entry-level full-stack developer, quickly adapting to a new tech stack including PostgreSQL, NestJS, and later Nuxt.js (Vue-based), despite having a background in React.  Navigated a steep learning curve, working across both backend and frontend tasks, and gaining hands-on experience in adapting to new ecosystems, tools, and workflows.

shortDescription: Leading the development of a community team project...
tasksPerformed: Leading the development of a community team project, actively contributing as a full-stack engineer while overseeing a frontend team and collaborating with the design team to ensure design consistency and feasibility.Act as a bridge between engineering and product, providing input on functionality, timelines, and user experience—functioning in a hybrid technical lead / product owner capacity.

shortDescription: Developed and maintained web applications using PHP...
tasksPerformed: Developed and maintained web applications using PHP, implementing efficient, secure backend logic for dynamic content and user interactions. Implemented debugging, testing, and troubleshooting processes to resolve issues, ensuring stability and security across applications
